Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average velocity of all teams

Name: minimize_project_duration
Description: Minimize the total duration of all projects

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the total severity of all active blockers

Name: maximize_feature_completion
Description: Maximize the number of features with status 'done'

Name: minimize_task_effort_variance
Description: Minimize the variance in estimated effort across all tasks in a sprint

Name: maximize_worker_utilization
Description: Maximize the average utilization of all workers

Name: minimize_sprint_goal_failure
Description: Minimize the number of sprints where the goal was not achieved
